p: Studies about medicinal plants have been conducted to verify their potency as medicinal remedies in modern therapeutics. A recent experimental and clinical studies have revealed several biological effects of the medicinal plant include hypolipidemic, antibacterial, anti-inflammatory, antidiabetic, antiplasmodial and antioxidant activities [ 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12]. Many efforts have been done to prevent and treat diabetes and malaria including traditional treatment using the medicinal plants. Ethnobotanically, the use of traditional medicine is based on the knowledge of the ancestors towards healing diseases.
